articles.title: America's Cup home defence group increases its commitment to $40 million - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Mark Dunphy has called on Team NZ to resume discussions over a home defence, but that door appears shut.
articles.content:
The Kiwi Home Defence group headed by businessman Mark Dunphy says it has increased its commitment to support Team New Zealand defending the Americas Cup in Auckland to $40 million.

articles.title: Solar storm confirms Vikings settled in North America exactly 1000 years ago - The Guardian

articles.title: Gates of the Arctic: I went to America's least-visited national park - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: With no roads or trails, most visitors access the breathtaking, 3.4 million hectare park and preserve by small bush plane.

articles.title: Vikings Settled In North America As Early As 1021, Researchers Say - KFI AM 640
